product.title: Hot Tools Pro Artist Black Gold One Step Round Brush Attachment - 1.5" HT1210BG
product.description: The Hot Tools Pro Artist Black Gold One Step Round Brush Attachment is the ultimate tool for styling short or layered hair with ease and precision. Whether you're looking to add volume, create soft curls, waves, or flips, this slim-barreled brush attachment is a must-have in your styling arsenal.Designed for styling professionals, this innovative attachment features advanced technology to ensure salon-quality results. The 1.5" size allows you to get close to the roots for added volume, while the ceramic titanium surface ensures that your hair glides smoothly for a pro-level shine.Featuring Refresh3MAXTM Activated Charcoal-infused bristles, this attachment not only styles your hair but also neutralizes odors, absorbs toxins, and creates beautiful second-day hair. The stylist-designed bristle and vent pattern make for faster drying and salon-worthy results every time.The corrosion-resistant Micro-ShineTM finish minimizes friction and reduces hair damage, so you can style your hair worry-free. The Black Gold titanium styling surface combines Nano Ceramic Titanium with Thermaglide ceramic coating for even heat distribution and smooth styling.With its detachable design, this round brush attachment is easy to store and perfect for on-the-go styling. Upgrade your styling toolkit with the Hot Tools Pro Artist Black Gold One Step Round Brush Attachment and achieve flawless hair results every time.
